document.full_text: bahrain, eager for formula one organizers to reinstate a motor race postponed after popular protests erupted in february, acted to prevent any unrest on thursday after lifting martial law earlier in the week.
document.title: bahrain wary of protests before formula one ruling
lines_and_colors: bahrain, eager for formula one organizers to reinstate a motor race postponed after popular protests erupted in february, acted to prevent any unrest on thursday after lifting martial law earlier in the week.
